channel.title: PS on XenoBlog
channel.description: Recent content in PS on XenoBlog

item.title: Windows 7 & RSAT
item.description: I finally found some time today to upgrade my primary work machine to Windows 7 RTM (Yeah). Since I do a lot of system administration one of the first things I put on there was my Powershell tools and RSAT.

item.title: Playing around with profiles.
item.description: In PowerShell you have the option create custom profiles that you can use, in the profiles you can create different aliases, change the prompt and a lot of other things, today we will look at adding some info to prompt.

item.title: Getting info from the eventlog with PowerShell
item.description: Started playing around with PowerShell, so I thought I would post a few simple things on the blog, maybe you won’t find it interesting, but it is a good way for me to remember, so BLAH!
